current.footercontenttext_design2:
Rewhipped takes the flavors of classic treats and makes them into unique, gourmet cookies. Our cookies are made from scratch with the finest ingredients, like Callebaut® and Guittard® chocolate. Full of satisfying handmade goodness, our cookies are suitable for any occasion, from small family gatherings to large receptions.

Read More

Shipping AND Delivery

We're dedicated to delivering your purchase as quickly and affordably as possible. We offer a range of delivery and pickup options, so you can choose the shipping method that best meets your needs.

Payment Methods

Every country and shopper has their prefered method to pay online. Offering your buyers safe and convenient payment choices can help your sale go smoothly, earn you positive Feedback, and bring them back for more.

current.text_pass:
We want to bring you an online experience that's equal to the high quality, gourmet cookies and pies that we sell.

We ran into a major issue that would have compromised that goal – oops – so we weren't able to release the new site as planned. We have worked out most of the problem, but there are still a few things to resolve.

Stay tuned!

settings.text2:
Available throughout the Wasatch Front

Rates as little as $6

Specify delivery date in checkout instructions

Pickup at our Herriman location

Most orders available for next day pickup

Pickup available after 2 pm

settings.content:
Local delivery is available throughout most of the Wasatch Front.

Rates are added during checkout and vary between $6-$26.

Deliveries are typically made between 2pm and 5pm. If you need your order to be delivered at a specific time or have a special request, please email or call us.

Before submitting your order, please verify the correct delivery address. If the delivery address is incorrect and redelivery is required, additional charges may apply.

If no one is available when delivery is attempted, the order will be left if there is a safe and clean place available. If redelivery is required, additional charges may apply.

settings.content_1:
Anyone can serve chocolate chip cookies.

Don't be just anyone.
settings.content_2:
Oh no, it's another company event. Who's going to run to the local warehouse store and pickup the jumbo size plastic containers of cookies? Don't be one of those people. Your co-workers are tired of the same old, preservative packed mundane cookies.

Rewhipped to the rescue!
Let us put a new spin on your event with an assortment of our deliciously unique cookies or over-the-top pies. We'll take all the headaches away by delivering* directly to you. At the time you want. We'll even help setup!

settings.content_1:
Some cookies are casual.

Not these cookies.
settings.content_2: With most cookies, you wind up sacrificing taste for beauty. You don't have to make that true of your wedding day.

settings.content:
1. 1.

    Depending on the size of your order, we’ll need a few days to prepare it. For orders over 10 dozen cookies, orders need to be placed at least 5 days in advance. For orders over 20 dozen cookies, orders need to be placed 10 days in advance.

  2. 2.

    We will deliver your order to the location of your event. Delivery fees will be determined at the time the order is placed. As many of our cookies are not stackable, we are also available to help setup your cookies to insure they are presented the best way possible!

  3. 3.

    We understand that plans can change. Our cookies are baked to order, so if you need to cancel or change your order in any way, we need 48 hours notice. Once your order has been baked we cannot reuse/resell the cookies and will not be able to issue any refunds.

  4. 4.

    If no one is available to accept the order when it's delivered, we will leave the cookies as long as there’s a safe, clean spot. If redelivery is required, additional delivery charges will apply.

Fair enough?

Order Now!

settings.content_1:
The best cookies on the planet!

So we've been told.
settings.title_2: How we make them so irresistible.
settings.content_2:
We take things like apple pie, french toast, German chocolate cake, and we put those flavors in the palm of your hand. Our cookies are 3¼ inches in diameter, piled high with delicious toppings. With one bite, you’ll quickly find yourself by a campfire, at a family reunion, or sitting in grandma’s kitchen.

We don't skimp on quality either. Our cookies are made from the highest quality ingredients – Callebaut® and Guittard® chocolate, pure Madagascar Bourbon vanilla, fresh grade A eggs, 100% pure Vermont maple syrup and locally sourced Lehi Roller Mills flour. Every part of our cookies are scratch made. We even make our own marshmallow that sits on top of Oliver!

settings.title_2: What it takes to be a Rewhipped pie.
settings.content_2:
Our pies measure 4-inches tall, in the center, and 9-inches in diameter. They are deep, wide and heavy. Definitely not for the faint of heart!

We offer unique flavors, like Peanut Butter Cup Pie, and the seasonal favorite Eggnog Cream Pie. Our Chocolate Mousse pie is rich and dark, made with Callebaut® Belgian chocolate and real cream. Our Praline Pecan Pie and Key Lime Pie are also very unique and available all year long.

Many of our customers can’t bear to eat pies made anywhere else. One taste, and you’ll be hooked!

In 2004, I started a small family business called Wasatch Cottage. I made baked goods at home and sold them to friends and family. My pies quickly emerged as customer favorites. Within two years, I was making about 80 pies each Thanksgiving. Many of my customers have been buying pies from me for the past 13 years.

For as long as I can remember, I've been a cookie lover. I decided when the day came to open my own bakery I would have to make cookies a part of it. Tired of the same variety of cookies that most stores and bakeries sell, I was determined to do something unique.

From this idea, Rewhipped was born.
I'm excited about the cookies and pies I have in the families I have created. In the future, I will be expanding each of them by putting a spin on familiar flavors that so many people love! If you have a dessert you love and would like to see it as one of my cookies, be sure to let me know!

settings.content_1:
They're a part of us.

Let them be a part of you.
settings.content_2:
Everything we bake comes from a recipe that has been developed in our kitchen. It is a labor of love, and when we are finished, that recipe feels like a part of us. It seemed fitting that we should give each cookie and pie a human name. We often name products after the family member or friend who inspired the recipe. Some of our products are named after celebrities or characters we love.

Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to get the inside story on certain names. Each member of our bakery family is special to us. We hope they will each become special to you.
